oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: British-made "Brodie" helmet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: British-made "Brodie" helmet with the interior mostly gone. Brodie helmets were frequently issued to U.S. soldiers early in the American involvement in the war. British helmets are identifiable by the use of split rivets to secure the chin strap loops to the helmet body.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
